name: vite-plugin-typo3
description: Vite plugin to collect assets from TYPO3 extensions
author: Simon Praetorius

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -b ./tsconfig.cjs.json ./tsconfig.esm.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.test:distribution: npm run test:distribution:pack && npm run test:distribution:cjs && npm run test:distribution:esm && npm run test:distribution:ts
scripts.test:distribution:pack: npm pack --pack-destination tests/distribution/ && cd tests/distribution/ && tar xzf vite-plugin-typo3*.tgz
scripts.test:distribution:cjs: cd tests/distribution/javascript-cjs/ && npm install --package-lock=false && npm run build
scripts.test:distribution:esm: cd tests/distribution/javascript-esm/ && npm install --package-lock=false && npm run build
scripts.test:distribution:ts: cd tests/distribution/typescript/ && npm install --package-lock=false && npm run build && npm run typecheck
